summary: An old farmhouse ... more nobody ... the vegetation begins to invade the old stones and the windmill ... the animals were locked up precipitately for the majority ... why ?
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4][color=#ff0000]Abandoned Farm[/color][/size][/b] [color=#00ff00]version 1.2[/color] No DLC required

[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp version Fr.[/color]

An old farmhouse ... more nobody ... the vegetation begins to invade the old stones and the windmill ... the animals were locked up precipitately for the majority ... why ?

[i]Une ferme ancienne ... plus personne ... la végétation commence à envahir les vieilles pierres ainsi que le moulin à vent ... les animaux ont été enfermés précipitamment pour la plupart ... pourquoi ?[/i]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/hU113Wc.gif[/img]

The Abandoned Farm is located between [color=#00ff00]Helgen[/color] and [color=#00ff00]Riverwood[/color]

This mod is an improved version of my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31373/?]Farm Animals - Mounts and Followers[/url] ([b]You must remove this mod before installing this one[/b])

The Owls are also in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76666/?] Curious Birds of Skyrim [/url]

The Frogs are also in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79546/?] Toads and Frogs of Skyrim [/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=155108abandonedfarm2.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/155108abandonedfarm2.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000]INSTALLATION [/color]

[color=#ff8c00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

1) You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#ff8c00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

2) You must place the .esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to obtain the 17 books...(Normally, this is done automatically !)


You can find the “Spell tome: Summon Spectral XXXX”, the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX”, the “Spell tome: Dismiss Summoned Farm animals”, at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun/Blancherive) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 1 hour (15' for the spectral mounts)

3) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):


[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001


These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=175248goatcompanion2.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/175248goatcompanion2.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000]Bugs or Problems[/color]

1) Sometimes there is some "distortions" of the neck of the geese...

The Chickens and the Goose can’t jump, fly or swim…

If you dismount in the water with the Chickens or the Goose, it is possible to swim in the air !! Solution: MOUNT AGAIN or SPACEBAR

2) You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have "lost" the “active” Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” or "`" or "~" key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

If problem with the Dialog Box of the followers/ companions (Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) you can enter / exit a house or make a fast travel

3) With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

4) If you have any problem with these mounts, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=7725832415.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/7725832415.jpg[/img][/url]

[size=4][b][color=#ff0000]Credits[/color][/b][/size]

The textures of Goats , Cows and Chickens are from [color=#ff0000] Bellyache [/color]; Mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3621] Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack [/url]("Asset use permission": "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me").

[color=#ff0000]Macadamstreet [/color] for the meshes and textures of the pig and the goose in his mod [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=125170176&searchtext=]Goosy goosa ! [/url]

[color=#ff0000]Jc1[/color] for the model of the Goose

[color=#ff0000] dogtown1 [/color]to convert the model of the Goose in skyrim, and for the model of the Pig

The meshes and textures of the Sheeps are from [color=#ff0000]stormshallow[/color] in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33273]Sheep Modders Resource [/url]

[color=#ff0000]Umar Muzammil[/color][url= http://www.youtube.com/umar6419]UMAR6419 [/url] for the model of the sheep in this site[url=http://thefree3dmodels.com/stuff/0-0-2014-0-17] The free 3D Models [/url] ("You are free to use these models in generating games, animations, multimedia, printed graphics, web graphics and others" and "you are free to distribute and modify the file as long as you attribute it's author(s)")

[color=#ff0000]cansu [/color] for the new texture of the Sheep in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37569]stormshallows sheep mod retextured [/url]

The mesh of the Flaming Chicken from [color=#ff0000]Darren83[/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54369/?] New Spell -El Pollo Diablo- [/url]

Free sounds : [url=http://www.universal-soundbank.com/]universal-soundbank[/url] - [url=http://www.sound-fishing.net/bruitages_animaux.html] Sound Fishing [/url] - [url=http://lasonotheque.org/] lasonotheque [/url] - [url=http://soundbible.com/] soundbible [/url] - [url=http://www.freesfx.co.uk] freesfx [/url] - [url=http://www.xeno-canto.org/]xeno-canto[/url]

[color=#ff0000]testiger2[/color] for the Mesh of the “Pack mule” for the goat in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68149/?] TesTiger's Mesh Resources [/url]

[color=#ff0000]LorSakyamuni [/color] for the Owl, the new Pig, the Piglet, the Ram, the Frog, the Wild Boar and the new Sheep, in the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76524/?] The Witcher 3 Monsters and Animals Resource Pack [/url] (“You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me”,“Pack containing a lot of monsters and animals included in the game The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt. All the original assets belong to [url=http://en.cdprojektred.com/] CD PROJEKT RED [/url] and are distributed with their permission. Feel free to use them, just remember to credit me.”); these animals are rigged by [color=#ff0000] SpikeDragonLord and jboyd4 [/color] in the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76203/?]Beasts of Tamriel[/url]

New textures for the Frog by [color=#ff0000]cansu[/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81383/?]Toads and Frogs of Skyrim retexture [/url]

[color=#ff0000] Markus Liberty [/color] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48582/?]Cyrodiil Farmhouse Tileset[/url] (“You may Use These Assets in your own Mod as long as credits are given to original author.”)

[color=#ff0000] Stroti and Tamira [/color] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37176/?] Strotis Old Mill Resource [/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62787/? ] Stroti's Treehouse Resource [/url] (“This is a modders resource.You may use the meshes and textures for your own mods as long as you give credit and you do not charge money for it.”)

[color=#ff0000] Renthal311[/color] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79341/?]3D decorations [/url] (« Modders resource and tutorials »)

[color=#ff0000] mr_siika and Tamira[/color] for the flying raven in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59602/? ]Mr. Siika Ravens and Vultures [/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=1289034318.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/1289034318.jpg[/img][/url]
